Name: Auto Login Fork
Author: Aida Enna
Punchline: Automatically logs you into a specified character when the game first opens. Also includes auto-login after disconnects, lobby errors, and connection timeouts.
Description: Automatically logs you into a specified character when the game first opens. Also includes auto-login after disconnects, lobby errors, and connection timeouts. This is a fork of the original plugin AutoLogin by Aida Enna.
